attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: he has entertained us as a comedian , singer ,acrobat and actor.He is also a writer and a superb raconteur.I can,t believe he only has an OBE.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
